title: Geshas Dancing, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LRC, in negative: [63 Geisha\'s Danc
description: six young women wearing traditional Japanese costumes, seated on two cloth-covered risers in front of folding screens; girl at top right plays a shamisen; three girls at bottom play drums; girl in LRC plays largest drum with large sticks
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
